CustomField.description: Formula field that is only used in Email templates to Product Manager to display the New Build checkbox field.
CustomField.formula: IF( New_Build__c , "This ICB requires a new build. Please create a task and assign it to the SE. Select New Build Request - ICB as the task type and subject.",".")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System Maintained Field: Verbiage that will be included in emails when the New Build checkbox is checked.
CustomField.label: New Build Verbiage PM
